languages.text: "Кхм... Я слишком долго живу, чтобы не воспринимать подобные предложения всерьез. Благодарю за заботу, Ваша Светлость. Я учту".
"Ahem... I've lived too long to take such suggestions seriously anymore. Thank you for your concern, Your {mf|Lord|Lady}ship. I will bear it in mind."
languages.original_text: "Кхм... Я слишком долго живу, чтобы не воспринимать подобные предложения всерьез. Благодарю за заботу, Ваша Светлость. Я учту".

traits.locale_text: "Ehm... I've lived too long to take such suggestions seriously anymore. Thank you for your concern, Your {mf|Lord|Lady}ship. I will bear it in mind."
traits.speaker: FootfallPirateVendor_Rizza_Ch_4

languages.text: “咳……我已经活得太久了，像这样的建议也不会再当真了。谢谢你的关心，大人。”
languages.original_text: "Ahem... I've lived too long to take such suggestions seriously anymore. Thank you for your concern, Your {mf|Lord|Lady}ship. I will bear it in mind."

traits.locale_text: “呃……我已经活得太久了，像这样的建议也不会再当真了。谢谢你的关心，大人。”
traits.speaker: FootfallPirateVendor_Rizza_Ch_4

languages.text: 「ゴホン…その様な提案を受け入れるには、もう長生きしすぎました。心配をしてくれてありがとうございます、陛下。覚えておきますよ」
languages.original_text: "Ahem... I've lived too long to take such suggestions seriously anymore. Thank you for your concern, Your {mf|Lord|Lady}ship. I will bear it in mind."

traits.locale_text: 「ゴホン…その様な提案を受け入れるには、もう長生きしすぎました。心配をしてくれてありがとうございます、陛下。覚えておきますよ」
traits.speaker: FootfallPirateVendor_Rizza_Ch_4

languages.text: «Ejem... He vivido demasiado como para seguir tomándome en serio ese tipo de sugerencias. Gracias por su preocupación, mi{mf|lord|lady}. Lo tendré en cuenta».
languages.original_text: "Ahem... I've lived too long to take such suggestions seriously anymore. Thank you for your concern, Your {mf|Lord|Lady}ship. I will bear it in mind."

traits.locale_text: «Emm... He vivido demasiado como para seguir tomándome en serio ese tipo de sugerencias. Gracias por su preocupación, mi{mf|lord|lady}. Lo tendré en cuenta».
traits.speaker: FootfallPirateVendor_Rizza_Ch_4

languages.text: "Ähm ... Ich lebe schon viel zu lange, um so etwas noch ernst zu nehmen. Danke für Eure Sorge, Euer {mf|Lord|Lady}schaft. Ich werde es mir merken."
languages.original_text: "Ahem... I've lived too long to take such suggestions seriously anymore. Thank you for your concern, Your {mf|Lord|Lady}ship. I will bear it in mind."

traits.locale_text: "Ähm ... Ich lebe schon viel zu lange, um so etwas noch ernst zu nehmen. Danke für Eure Sorge, Euer {mf|Lord|Lady}schaft. Ich werde es mir merken."
traits.speaker: FootfallPirateVendor_Rizza_Ch_4

languages.text: « Hum... Je suis bien trop vieille pour prendre ce genre de suggestions au sérieux. Mais merci pour l'avertissement, Votre Seigneurie. Je le garderai à l'esprit. »
languages.original_text: "Ahem... I've lived too long to take such suggestions seriously anymore. Thank you for your concern, Your {mf|Lord|Lady}ship. I will bear it in mind."

traits.locale_text: « Ha... Je suis bien trop vieille pour prendre ce genre de suggestions au sérieux. Mais merci pour l'avertissement, Votre Seigneurie. Je le garderai à l'esprit. »
traits.speaker: FootfallPirateVendor_Rizza_Ch_4

languages.text: "Öhö... Böylesi imaları ciddiye almamayı öğrenecek kadar uzun yaşadım. İlgin için teşekkürler {mf|Lord|Leydi} Hazretleri, aklımda bulunduracağım."
languages.original_text: "Ahem... I've lived too long to take such suggestions seriously anymore. Thank you for your concern, Your {mf|Lord|Lady}ship. I will bear it in mind."

traits.locale_text: "Öhöm... Böylesi imaları ciddiye almamayı öğrenecek kadar uzun yaşadım. İlgin için teşekkürler {mf|Lord|Leydi} Hazretleri, aklımda bulunduracağım."
